https://t.co/LG47cxQi3B

tweet_text: Some of those highway projects deliberately displaced Black families, and many more were built without regard for Black communities. Two examples are in the Fifth District: the Sweet Auburn and Summerhill communities were both divided by the Downtown Connector and I-20.
